thread.title: Israel Deploys Troops to Help Police in New Security Push
thread.title_full: Israel Deploys Troops to Help Police in New Security Push - WSJ

author: Rory Jones
title: Israel Deploys Troops to Help Police in New Security Push
text:
Israel on Wednesday began deploying more soldiers to support police in cities across the country in an effort to tighten security after weeks of violence among Israelis and Palestinians which has left more than 30 dead and hundreds injured.
The Israeli army said six companies, made up of hundreds of soldiers, would join police forces after a government security cabinet decision late Tuesday approved additional steps to bolster...
